successes.title: ZANO - Autonomous. Intelligent. Swarming. Nano Drone.
successes.description: Autonomous, Intelligent, Developable. Meet ZANO the world's most sophisticated nano drone - aerial photo and HD video capture platform.

Pledges.description: A HUGE THANK YOU! We appreciate your support in bringing ZANO to life! You will get a spot on our Wall Of Fame on flyzano.com
WALL OF FAME - Thank you for being a part of bringing ZANO to life! Your name be up top on our Wall of Fame at flyzano.com. We will also include you on all the VIP project updates for ZANO.

SUPER EARLY BIRD FIRST EDITION WHITE ZANO - You will receive 1 x First Edition White ZANO. 1 x Charging Cable. You will also receive FREE capability software updates for 12 months after public launch.
SUPER EARLY BIRD FIRST EDITION BLACK ZANO. You will receive 1 x First Edition Black ZANO. 1 x Charging Cable. You will also receive FREE capability software updates for 12 months after public launch.
EARLY BIRD FIRST EDITION BLACK ZANO. You will receive 1 x First Edition Black ZANO. 1 x Charging Cable. You will also receive FREE capability software updates for 12 months after public launch.
EARLY BIRD FIRST EDITION WHITE ZANO. You will receive 1 x First Edition White ZANO. 1 x Charging Cable. You will also receive FREE capability software updates for 12 months after public launch.

SUPER EARLY BIRD FIRST EDITION BLACK ZANO and Standard ZANO Carry Case. You will receive 1 x First Edition Black ZANO. 1 x Charging Cable. 1 x Spare Battery. 1 x Clam Shell, zipper ZANO branded carry case. You will also receive FREE capability software updates for 12 months after public launch.

SUPER EARLY BIRD FIRST EDITION WHITE ZANO and Standard ZANO Carry Case. You will receive 1 x First Edition White ZANO. 1 x Charging Cable. 1 x Spare Battery. 1 x Clam Shell, zipper ZANO branded carry case. You will also receive FREE capability software updates for 12 months after public launch.

EARLY BIRD FIRST EDITION BLACK ZANO and Standard ZANO Carry Case. You will receive 1 x First Edition Black ZANO. 1 x Charging Cable. 1 x Spare Battery. 1 x Clam Shell, zipper ZANO branded carry case. You will also receive FREE capability software updates for 12 months after public launch.

EARLY BIRD FIRST EDITION WHITE ZANO and Standard ZANO Carry Case. You will receive 1 x First Edition White ZANO. 1 x Charging Cable. 1 x Spare Battery. 1 x Clam Shell, zipper ZANO branded carry case. You will also receive FREE capability software updates for 12 months after public launch.

FIRST EDITION WHITE ZANO W/ LIMITED EDITION CARRY CASE - You will receive 1 x First Edition White ZANO in a Limited Edition Carry Case. Included in this reward is a ZANOfuel Portable Charging Stick and 1 x Charging Cable. You will also receive FREE capability software updates for 12 months after public launch.

FIRST EDITION BLACK ZANO W/ LIMITED EDITION CARRY CASE - You will receive 1 x First Edition Black ZANO in a Limited Edition Carry Case and 1 x Charging Cable. Included in this reward is a ZANOfuel Portable Charging Stick. You will also receive FREE capability software updates for 12 months after public launch.

RED ZANO W/ LIMITED EDITION RED CARRY CASE - You will receive 1 x RED ZANO in a Limited Edition Red Carry Case. Included in this reward is a ZANOfuel Portable Charging Stick and 1 x Charging Cable, 2 x Batteries and 2 x complete sets of propellers.
You will also receive FREE capability software updates for 12 months after public launch.

LIMITED EDITION CAMOUFLAGE ZANO W/ LIMITED EDITION CAMOUFLAGE CARRY CASE - You will receive 1 x Limited Edition Camouflage ZANO in a Limited Edition Camouflage Carry Case.
Included in this reward is a ZANOfuel Portable Charging Stick, 1 x Charging Cable and 1 x Spare Battery. 
You will also receive FREE capability software updates for 12 months after public launch.

LIMITED EDITION GLOW IN THE DARK ZANO W/ LIMITED EDITION GLOW IN THE DARK CARRY CASE (The ZANO logo will glow in the dark on the case. See updates for images!) - You will receive 1 x Limited Edition Glow In The Dark ZANO in a Limited Edition Carry Case.
Included in this reward is a ZANOfuel Portable Charging Stick, 1 x Charging Cable and 1 x Spare Battery. 
You will also receive FREE capability software updates for 12 months after public launch.
2 x FIRST EDITION BLACK ZANOs. You will receive 2 x First Edition Black ZANOs and 2 x Charging Cables. You will also receive FREE capability software updates for 12 months after public launch.

2 x FIRST EDITION WHITE ZANOs. You will receive 2 x First Edition Black ZANOs and 2 x Charging Cables and 2 x Spare batteries. You will also receive FREE capability software updates for 12 months after public launch.

2 x SUPER EARLY BIRD FIRST EDITION BLACK ZANO and Standard ZANO Carry Case. You will receive 2 x First Edition Black ZANO. 2 x Charging Cable. 2 x Spare Battery. 2 x Clam Shell, zipper ZANO branded carry case. You will also receive FREE capability software updates for 12 months after public launch.
